cssmd:property-def.description: Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow

cssmd:property-def.description: Font used for an element's text
Name of the font used for an element's text
Style of the font used for an element's text
Variant of the font used for an element's text
Size of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | percentage | standard font size value
cssmd:property-def.enum: large larger medium small smaller x-large x-small xx-large xx-small

cssmd:property-def.description: Boldness of the font used for an element's text
Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
Background of an element
Color used for an element's background
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow

cssmd:property-def.description: The horizontal alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the text-align values | string on which cells in a table will align

cssmd:property-def.description: The vertical alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the vertical-align values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between characters
The spacing between lines
The indentation of text (Does not work on Div or Span)
A value that indicates whether lines are automatically broken inside the object
The display mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: compact inline inline-table list-item marker table table-caption table-cell table-column table-column-group table-footer-group table-header-group table-row table-row-group

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of a positioned element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The height of a positioned element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The padding around all four edges of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The padding on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The padding on the right edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The padding on the top edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The padding on the bottom edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The margin around all four edges of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The margin on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The margin on the right edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The margin on the top edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The margin on the bottom edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The border around all four edges of an element
The border on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The border on the right edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The border on the top edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The border on the bottom edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
The color of the border around all four edges of an element (Only specify one color)
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border around all four edges of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double hidden none solid

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of the border around all four edges of an element (Values can only be > 0)
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the border on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
cssmd:property-def.enum: aqua black blue fuchsia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of the border on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border on the left edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double hidden none solid

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the border on the right edge of an element (Not supported on Div or Span)

cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double hidden none solid

cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page box size values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: Crop or cross marks rendered outside the page box
Page breaks before an element
Page breaks after an element
Page breaks inside an element
The bullet characteristics of a list item
The bullet style of a list item
cssmd:property-def.enum: disc circle square lower-roman upper-roman hebrew armenian georgian cjk-ideographic hiragana katakana hiragana-iroha katakana-iroha none

cssmd:property-def.description: The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the unicode-bidi values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The table border model
